Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_rep: Due to the {%s} relationship between you and {%s}, you can get the current position of {%s} directlyï¼š
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_track: Navigate to the current location of the exiled fleet
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des1: The authorities of Idoneus Garrison in %s have imposed a strong crackdown on their opponents, forcing the latter to finally choose to assemble a secretly formed fleet and leave their former residence.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des1_high: They will be preparing to travel to {%s}
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_title2: Exiles reside temporarily in a star system
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_intel2: After a long trek, %s will be in the destination system for a short period of time.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des2: %s will receive a small vibration due to the outsiders, and the impact of the exiled fleet on the various forces and colonies in this star system remains unknown. The fleet will depart again in a while.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_intel3: %s left their current position and headed for the next stop.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des3: According to local sources, the exiled fleet would be preparing to head to the %s, previously the star system seemed to have little appeal to them.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des4: The strike on the exiled fleet had forced them to scatter and flee, with the remnants of the fleet no longer able to support any future action.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_intel5: %s decided to settle permanently on a planet.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des5: After a long period of resource gathering and intelligence exploration, the exiles were finally assured of being able to settle on one of %s 's planets, and their efforts would perhaps show results in the near future.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_des6: They eventually moved the logistics sustainment facilities on the fleet to the original planets and began a new life. And after that, who had been expelled from Idoneus Citadel were able to come directly here without having to suffer another displacement.
Intel.SUN_ICE_remnant_war_title: An urgent call for help from the Exile fleet
Intel.SUN_ICE_remnant_war_brief: Emergency force should be sent to %s as soon as possible to rescue %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_remnant_war_succeed: You have succeed in this rescue.
Intel.SUN_ICE_remnant_war_failed: You have failed in this rescue.
Intel.SUN_ICE_remnant_war_information_1: From the information you received, there may exists a huge amount of %s fleet.
Intel.SUN_ICE_remnant_war_information_2: Clean all or most of the enemy force and then contact with %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_fleet_call_information_1: Go to %s's location to know what happened within days.
Intel.SUN_ICE_supplies_deliver_detail: You've accepted a contract to deliver a quantity of %s to %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_supplies_deliver_information_1: To make the delivery, contact with the specific agent at %s openly.
Intel.SUN_ICE_special_cache_detail: You've accepted a contract to deliver a quantity of goods to %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_special_cache_information_1: You've learned that there is a special cache to be found in the %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_special_cache_information_2: You've found and looted the special cache in the %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_special_cache_information_3: The agent that informed you of this is waing in %s, he wants the special item from this cache and willing to offer payment.
Intel.SUN_ICE_ship_recruitment_detail: You've accepted a contract to deliver a quantity of combat force to %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_ship_recruitment_information_1: To make the delivery, contact with the specific agent at %s openly.
Intel.SUN_ICE_goods_procurement_detail: You've accepted a contract to deliver a quantity of goods to %s.
Intel.SUN_ICE_goods_procurement_information_1: To make the delivery, contact with the specific agent at %s openly.

Misc.SUN_ICE_consumables_backcycling_2: All industries demand %d less unit of all the commodities they demand
Misc.SUN_ICE_duel_enemy_tagline: The Flagship of an Idoneus Isolationist blockade fleet
Misc.SUN_ICE_duel_bi_1: The enemy ship has a weak point near the center where the armor doesn't reconstruct
Misc.SUN_ICE_duel_bi_2: However, torpedoes simply ignore these effect and break armor and hull in single strike
Misc.SUN_ICE_duel_bi_3: The longer the battle delays, the more the situation will favor the opponent
Misc.SUN_ICE_sacrifice_player_tagline: ISS Willow Seed and heavy escort
Misc.SUN_ICE_sacrifice_bi_1: Dissabling an Athame's weapon while it's charging will force it to overload
Misc.SUN_ICE_sacrifice_bi_2: Shields may not help against Athames, but EMP may
Misc.SUN_ICE_exodus_bi_1: Use carriers to offset the maneuvering advantages of opposing missile frigates and Athame
Misc.SUN_ICE_exodus_bi_2: Delay the enemy as far as possible with unimportant ships
Misc.SUN_ICE_helpInfo1: You have received a communication from %s, and by inference from the encryption specifications, this message is vital.
Misc.SUN_ICE_helpInfo2:
"Greetings, I am the Commander-in-Chief of the Exile Fleet and I am here to express our goodwill on behalf of the people of the entire fleet. "
"It all began with those of us called 'exiles' - people who, like our forerunners, wanted to witness the visions and dreams of the world with our own eyes after being chosen to leave. But nay, the chaos and crises of the Sector, the loneliness of being homeless and the sadness of facing danger head-on are gradually eating away at us. We are almost isolated and untrusted, wandering alone in the darkness of the universe. The outward attitude of the Idoneus Citadel, as it has been for centuries, has inflicted a number of cascading effects on our reputation as well. We have wondered, if even the most refined merchants do not want to have anything to do with us, is it our destiny to go to the grave with our memories? "
" until we met, and as such everyone from the head logistician to the workshop handyman cannot praise you enough for your selfless help. Your ability to support us in what has been considered a pipe dream has also been more than recognised - even the last Chief Commander believed that you could lead us to a better future while preserving our spirit. "
"A settlement as meaningful to us as a milestone has been chosen, a place where people like us who do not want to hold on to our scraps can rest in peace, and where the so-called 'exile' should move forward in a more secure manner. But until then, all of us have agreed to initiate a request-"

 You tap on that letterhead pattern on the communication interface, and all that is shown to you is a single sentence. 

"Do you wish to help us maintain this home?"
Misc.SUN_ICE_helpInfo3: The final settle location is %s, you will decide how to respond to them.
